resources.string: One of the most %1$s characters in fiction is named \"Tarzan of the %2$s.\" Tarzan was raised by a/an %3$s and lives in the %4$s jungle in the heart of darkest %5$s. He spends most of his time eating %6$s and swinging from tree to %7$s. Whenever he gets angry, he beats on his chest and says, \"%8$s!\" This is his war cry. Tarzan always dresses in %9$s shorts made from the skin of a/an %10$s and his best friend is a/an %11$s chimpanzee named Cheetah. He is supposed to be able to speak to elephants and %12$s.
